T04sanss14u:88: tatra mahārāja yaś ca saṃkalpo yaś ca saṃkalpayitā |

T04sanss14u:100: rāja samayo yad ayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati |
T04sanss14u:101: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati |

T04sanss14u:111: tan mahārāja kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanss14u:112: cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante dṛḍhāḥ sārâikaghanā vajramayās teṣām api kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanss14u:113: sumeravaḥ parvatarājāno yugaṃdharā nimiṃdharêśādharā yāvat kālaparvatāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante |

T04sanss14u:118: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadâyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate |

T04sanss14u:122: tasyâgninā dahyamānāyā maṣir api na prajāyate tad yathâpi nāma sarpiṣo vā tailasya vâgninā dahyamānasya na maṣir na chāyikā prajñāyate evam evâsyās trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyā lokadhātor agninā dahyamānāyā nâiva maṣir na chāyikâvaśiṣṭā prajñāyate |
T04sanss14u:123: evam adbhir lavaṇavilayavad vāyunā vairambhavātâbhihataśakuntavat pṛthivyāṃ na kiñcid avaśiṣṭaṃ prajñāyatae iti paṭhyate |
T04sanss14u:124: tatra mahārāja pṛthivīdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ vyayo 'pi śūnyôtpanno 'pi
T04sanss14u:126: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nôpalabhyate 'nyatra
T04sanss14u:128: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ |
T04sanss14u:129: evam evâitan mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyaṃ |
T04sanss14u:131: yad idam asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āpaḥ |
T04sanss14u:139: vaśā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaḥ śoṇitaṃ kṣīraṃ prasrāvêty ādir ayam ucyante ādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ |
T04sanss14u:140: pe ||bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat priyaṃ dṛṣṭvâśru pravartate |
T04sanss14u:143: yāvat sa mahārājâbdhātur na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanss14u:144: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadâdhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ pariśuṣyati |
T04sanss14u:147: vivartamāne khalu punar loke samantād dvātriṃśat paṭalâbhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante saṃsthāya sarvāvantaḥ
T04sanss14u:152: tatêyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokād udakena sphuṭā bhavati |

T04sanss14u:154: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate |

T04sanss14u:186: yan manuṣyâraṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kārpāsapicunâvāsam anveṣante yad utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati grāmapradeśam api dahati yāvad dvīpaṃ vā kakṣaṃ tṛṇānāṃ vā dāvaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā yāvad dahan paraitîty ādi |tatra mahārājâdhyātmikas tejodhātur utpadyate na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati |

T04sanss14u:193: kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ pippalakā vātâṣṭhīlā vātagulmâśvāsapraśvāsâṅgânusāriṇo vāyavêty ādi |

T04sanss14u:206: yad asmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiram iti vā yāvan mukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍyā vā yena câbhyavaharati yatra câvatiṣṭhate |
T04sanss14u:209: evaṃ bāhye 'pi yad asphuṭam aspharaṇīyaṃ rūpagatenâpaliguddhaṃ suṣirabhāvaś chidraṃ |
T04sanss14u:211: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat karmapratyayād āyatanāni prādurbhavanti tāny ākāśadhātuṃ paricārayanti
T04sanss14u:214: bhavati samayo yad rūpaṃ bibharti sarvam ākāśībhavati |
T04sanss14u:219: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣôtthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ
T04sanss14u:221: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tatrâkāśaḥ kutas tad āgatam iti |
T04sanss14u:225: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punar eva tad udapānaṃ vā yāvat puṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet
T04sanss14u:226: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tad ākāśaṃ kvacid gatam iti |

T04sanss14u:247: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur nêndriyaniśrito na viṣayebhyâgato na madhye 'ntarasthāyī sa nâdhyātma bahirdhā nôbhayam
T04sanss14u:249: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur vastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ |
T04sanss14u:250: sôtpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati |

T04sanss14u:256: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ |
T04sanss14u:260: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātor abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor yāvat |
T04sanss14u:261: tatra pṛthivīdhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ nâbdhātuprasādo na tejodhātuprasādo na vāyudhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ |

T04sanss14u:264: evaṃ yāvan na vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmasyâyatanaṃ vâyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ
T04sanss14u:268: niśceṣṭā hy ete dharmā niṣṭhāpārā nirvāṇasamā |
T04sanss14u:269: iti hi mahārājâikâikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nôpalabhate
T04sanss14u:276: kas teṣāṃ prasādo vā kṣobho vā |
T04sanss14u:279: iti hy atyantatayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvântato nôpalabhyate
T04sanss14u:281: anāgamanatāṃ gamanatāṃ côpādāya sthānam apy asya nôpalabhyate
T04sanss14u:293: yāvad iti hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣâbhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatâkāśadhātuparyavasānâprāptikā avyavahārânabhilāpyânabhilapanīyāḥ |
T04sanss14u:294: yatra mahārājêndriyāṇi pratihanyante te viṣayêty ucyante |

T04sanss14u:326: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet |

T04sanss14u:338: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśet
T04sanss14u:341: trividhaṃ kāyena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā |
T04sanss14u:342: tac ca karmâbhisaṃskṛtam āditâiva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
T04sanss14u:343: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nôttarāṃ nôrdhvaṃ nâdho nânuvidiśaṃ |
T04sanss14u:347: jīvitêndriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāc
T04sanss14u:351: tad yathâpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇîti manasârambaṇaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss14u:352: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenâdhipatinā tena ca karmaṇârambaṇenâupapattyaṃśikadvayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānam utpadyate |
T04sanss14u:353: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vâsure kāye yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā deveṣu |
T04sanss14u:354: tasya ca prathamavijñānasyâupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyânantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate |
T04sanss14u:356: tatra yaś caramavijñānasya nirodhas tatra cyutir iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
T04sanss14u:360: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati |
T04sanss14u:362: tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati
T04sanss14u:366: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanss14u:375: karmaṇāṃ câbandhyatā prajāyate vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā na câtra kaścit kartā na bhoktânyatra nāmasaṃketāt |
T04sanss14u:377: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnântare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet |
T04sanss14u:380: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnântare śatruḥ |
T04sanss14u:385: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet |
T04sanss14u:391: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrur na saṃvidyate kutaḥ punas tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaḥ |
T04sanss14u:392: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yas tam abhiniviśet |
T04sanss14u:394: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san pratihanyate |
T04sanss14u:399: suptaḥ svapnântare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃoham āpadyate |
T04sanss14u:400: sa śayitavibuddhas taṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmoham anusmaret |
T04sanss14u:401: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā |
T04sanss14u:402: yāvad evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi
T04sanss14u:403: dṛṣṭvôpekṣāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san muhyati mūḍho mohajaṃ
T04sanss14u:405: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt |
T04sanss14u:407: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret |
T04sanss14u:408: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet |
T04sanss14u:413: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nôpalabhyate |
T04sanss14u:420: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate
T04sanss14u:424: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ |
T04sanss14u:429: mukto mocayeyam āśvastâśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti |
T04sanss14u:430: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate 'iśvaryâdhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ |
T04sanss14u:434: svapnôpamā viṣayâtarṣakâtṛptikarāḥ ||atrânantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛtâivaṃ paṭhyate |
T04sanss14u:435: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati
T04sanss14u:438: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam anantayaśasaṃ tathâvasīdantaṃ |
T04sanss14u:444: mahārājânantayaśāś caturdvīpeṣu rājyâiśvaryaṃ kārayitvâbandhyamanorathatām anubhūya sarvadrumâkālaphalatāṃ
T04sanss14u:446: hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvôpakaraṇavarṣaṃ cânubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā śakrasyârdhâsanam ākramyātîcchayā na mukto 'tṛptâiva kāmaiḥ kālagatêti |
T04sanss14u:447: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryêty evam uktvā ca rājânantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt |
T04sanss14u:451: smāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyate
T04sanss14u:452: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyatae ity ādi ||
T04sanss14u:456: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ |
T04sanss14u:461: anājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nâlābho
T04sanss14u:462: na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nâyaśaḥ |
T04sanss14u:464: tatra jinena jagasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya |
T04sanss14u:465: yena jagat sugatasya sakāśe saṃjanayīha prasādasukhârthe ||
T04sanss14u:466: saṃvṛti prajñamayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaḍgatayo bhaṇi satvagaṇānāṃ |
T04sanss14u:467: narakatiraś ca tathâiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃś ca marūṃś ca ||
T04sanss14u:468: nīcakulāṃs tathôccakulāṃś ca āḍhyakulāṃś ca daridrakulāṃś cêty ādi ||
T04sanss14u:471: katamâiṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T04sanss14u:472: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanâho śvit saṃjñôtâho saṃskārâtha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā
T04sanss14u:475: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T04sanss14u:481: tad evam anupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ |
T04sanss14u:485: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ ||
T04sanss14u:492: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir anantakoṭir anāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi ||
T04sanss14u:497: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcânantaryāṇi |
T04sanss14u:499: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ |
T04sanss14u:506: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nôpalabhāmahe
T04sanss14u:509: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate |
T04sanss14u:510: koṭim api sa tasyôpalabhate dvaye câsau caratîti ||
T04sanss14u:512: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhâbhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ |
T04sanss14u:513: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathâiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ
T04sanss14u:515: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ |
T04sanss14u:516: na ca vacana câsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti ||
T04sanss14u:517: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na câsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ |
T04sanss14u:518: tathêmi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ ||
T04sanss14u:520: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ |
T04sanss14u:521: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ ||yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam |
T04sanss14u:522: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi
T04sanss14u:524: yatha naru ihêndrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam |
T04sanss14u:525: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi
T04sanss14u:526: sarvadharmāḥ ||puravara yathâṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na
T04sanss14u:528: yatha nagara tathâṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ
T04sanss14u:529: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā |
T04sanss14u:530: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi
T04sanss14u:533: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nâpi snehadhātuḥ |
T04sanss14u:534: vimṛśatu bherîva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra
T04sanss14u:535: sarvadharmāḥ ||hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati
T04sanss14u:539: tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ ||
T04sanss14u:540: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nâpi sa svatantraḥ |
T04sanss14u:541: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi
T04sanss14u:545: satvaś câsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat |
T04sanss14u:547: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjâriham ||
T04sanss14u:548: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [[DOUBT]] daśaddiśigataṃ nâivaṃ parīdṛśyate |
T04sanss14u:550: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devâtideva tvayā |
T04sanss14u:551: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ |
T04sanss14u:552: tena tvāṃ dvipadôttamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjâriham ||
T04sanss14u:553: satvānâiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyâpanītaṃ dukhaṃ |
T04sanss14u:554: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair nôditāḥ ||
T04sanss14u:556: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ ||
T04sanss14u:558: nâivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā nâiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ ||
T04sanss14u:559: uktaṃ cô sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ |
T04sanss14u:560: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ ||
T04sanss14u:561: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye |
T04sanss14u:563: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate ||
T04sanss14u:564: śamathaś câtha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune |
T04sanss14u:565: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ |
T04sanss14u:569: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ |
T04sanss14u:570: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa nôtpadyate na nirudhyate |
T04sanss14u:572: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nôpalabhyate na tac cakṣur nêndriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya
T04sanss14u:575: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ nô tu khalu paramâ-
T04sanss14u:578: evaṃ cakṣuś cêndriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālôpalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram ||
T04sanss14u:582: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ |
T04sanss14u:584: atrâiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha |
T04sanss14u:587: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenâsya vyākaraṇam ||
T04sanss14u:594: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibi-
T04sanss14u:598: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumâṅgaśo vicārayasi |
T04sanss14u:601: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ |
T04sanss14u:602: śakaṭâṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya câiva kriyāṃ ||
T04sanss14u:603: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu |
T04sanss14u:604: vātêritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ ||
T04sanss14u:605: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutâśanaṃ ca yajane |
T04sanss14u:606: na nivartate vahnis tathâiva karmasya kartāraḥ ||
T04sanss14u:607: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate |
T04sanss14u:610: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin |
T04sanss14u:614: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharmôtpadyate utânutpannaḥ |
T04sanss14u:622: sā ca śūnyatā nôtpadyate na nirudhyate |
T04sanss14u:624: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyôktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā nôtpatsyante na nirotsyante |
T04sanss14u:627: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathâbhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā nôtpadyante na nirudhyante |
T04sanss14u:630: saṃskṛtā dharmôtpadyante nirudhyante cêty asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ |
T04sanss14u:633: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyôttrāsapadaparihārârthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante cêti |
T04sanss14u:634: na câtra kasyacid dharmasyôtpādo na nirodhêti ||
T04sanss14u:636: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ |
T04sanss14u:644: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati |
T04sanss14u:646: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ parasparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti |
T04sanss14u:652: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti nâite kasyacit |
T04sanss14u:654: nâite bhagavan dharmôdvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante |
T04sanss14u:655: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye |
T04sanss14u:658: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmîti |
T04sanss14u:660: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss14u:662: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati |
T04sanss14u:663: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratîti |
T04sanss14u:669: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti ||
T04sanss14u:673: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramârthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād |
T04sanss14u:685: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmêti
T04sanss14u:696: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate |
T04sanss14u:697: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti ||
T04sanss14u:698: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ |
T04sanss14u:699: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte |
T04sanss14u:701: nâsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nâsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam eva paśyatîty ādi ||
T04sanss14u:705: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrâvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat
T04sanss14u:710: sā câitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmâvajñā câivaṃ bhāvanīyā ||
T04sanss14u:711: yadi satvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā |
T04sanss14u:712: ekasya hi parâtmatvaṃ viruddhaṃ saṃbhavet kathaṃ ||
T04sanss14u:713: vinâlambanam apy etad ācaranty eva dehinaḥ |
T04sanss14u:718: na tu me gauravāt saukhyam ihâpi janadurbhagāt ||
T04sanss14u:724: śabdas tāvad acittatvān māṃ stautîti na saṃbhavaḥ |
T04sanss14u:725: paraḥ kila mayi prītêty ayaṃ me matibhramaḥ ||
T04sanss14u:726: tattuṣṭyâiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadā astu sā |
T04sanss14u:727: tatsukhena na cet kāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama ||
T04sanss14u:728: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā |
T04sanss14u:729: na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyam ihâṇv api ||
T04sanss14u:732: na dharmo nâyur ārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanâdibhiḥ |
T04sanss14u:747: haren muniḥ || sādṛśyād anyad apy etad vārisrotovad īkṣyate |
T04sanss14u:748: tad evêdam iti bhrāntyā tatve tiṣṭhāmy ato balāt ||
T04sanss14u:749: avastu câitat sādṛśyaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca janayiṣyati |
T04sanss14u:750: ahaṃ câitac ca sarvaṃ ca na cirān na bhaviṣyati |
